de.systemagmbh.tools.table
Class CSysTableTool

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.table.CSysTableTool
public final class CSysTableTool
extends Object

CSysTableTool provides some useful methods when working on ISysTables.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit, Udo Friedrich 09.04.2001

                             String columname)
Deletes a Column of an ISysTable, that is known by name.

columname - The name of the column

Deletes the current row of an ISysTable.

Parameters:
table - The Table to modify

copyField

public static void copyField(String name,
                             ISysTable source,
                             ISysTable target)
Copies a Field of a ISysTable at the current row.

Parameters:
name - The name of the field (must be equal in both Tables)
source - The Table to copy from
target - The Table to copy to

copyFieldIfNotNull

public static void copyFieldIfNotNull(String sourceFieldName,
                                      String targetFieldName,
                                      ISysTable source,
                                      ISysTable target)
Set the value of a ISysTable in another ISysTable. Do this only if the value is not null. Otherwise the old value remains. The update is performed.

Parameters:
sourceFieldName - The name of the field in the new ISysTable of which the value has to be used.
targetFieldName - The name of the field in the old ISysTable of which the value has to be set.
source - The ISysTable whose field has to be used.
target - The ISysTable whose field has to be set.

getColumnNames

public static String[] getColumnNames(ISysTable t)
Get the names of all columns as a String array. Frequently needed to set Multilist column headings.

Parameters:
t - ISysTable to use.
Returns:
The names of all columns of the ISysTable as a String array.
If the given table is null this method returns null.

readFromFile

public static ISysTable readFromFile(String fileName,
                                     String delim)
                              throws IOException,
                                     CSysTableException
Create a ISysTable from an ASCII-File. Inside the File columns must be seperated by delim, first line are Names. All Columns are treated as Strings. This method uses the standard encoding to convert the file contents.

Parameters:
fileName - the file to read from
delim - a String used as delimiter (use the same as for the export from Excel or used by writeToFile or list)
Returns:
new created ISysTable.
Throws:
IOException - If file operation goes wrong.
CSysTableException - if something goes wrong

equalResultTables

public static boolean equalResultTables(ISysTable t1,
                                        ISysTable t2)
Compares two ISysTables. Should be included in ISysTable as ISysTable.equals(ISysTable)

Parameters:
t1 - first ISysTable to compare with second.
t2 - second ISysTable to compare with first.
Returns:
true, if all Fields and values are equal.

join

public static ISysTable join(ISysTable t1,
                             ISysTable t2)
                      throws CSysTableException
Merges two ISysTables.
Warnings:
  • t1 gets modified and is returned, after t2 was appended.
  • The objects are not cloned!

Parameters:
t1 - ISysTable where rows get added.
t2 - ISysTable where added rows get copied from.
Returns:
t1 with t2 appended.
Throws:
CSysTableException - if a table method fails

split

public static ISysTable split(ISysTable t1,
                              String name,
                              boolean flag)
                       throws CSysTableException
Extracts all signed rows of a given ISysTable into a new ISysTable. The given column must be a boolean column. The value of the rows of this column is the sign if a row has to be copied or not. It will be copied if its value is equal to the given boolean value. The column that contains the flag is not copied.

Attention:
If the given column name does not exist null is returned.
This is not a real object copy! That is the instance of a ISysTable in a column of class ISysTable is the same as in the original table.

Parameters:
t1 - ISysTable to copy from.
name - of the column that holds the Boolean value
flag - Only rows whose values are equal to 'flag' are copied.
Returns:
ISysTable with rows with the value of 'flag'.
Throws:
CSysTableException - if something goes wrong

splitRows

public static ISysTable splitRows(ISysTable t1,
                                  int[] rows)
                           throws CSysTableException
Extracts a ISysTable from another ISysTable where the row numbers given in the second argument are copied.

Parameters:
t1 - ISysTable to copy from.
rows - integer array of rows to be copied.
Returns:
ISysTable with copied rows.
Throws:
CSysTableException - if something goes wrong
